description:
Momoka discovers she has a powerful rival, one who can actually take a decent photo of Fuyuki. To beat that, is Momoka willing to make a deal with the devil(ish Sergeant Keroro)? And Keroro and Fuyuki find themselves near Grandma`s house, so they pay a visit, except she`s out. While waiting for her to come back, Fuyuki plays his childhood games with Keroro and takes a stroll down memory lane.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amie et ennemie / Tous les deux...
Momoka - An Ultimate Enemy is a Difficult One to Read / Keroro & Fuyuki - Just Us Two...
桃華 強敵と書いて"とも"と読む であります/ ケロロ&冬樹 ふたりで... であります
